metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8669 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: libraries/config/messages.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.12, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.2, and 4.5.x before 4.5.3.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted request, which reveals the full path in an error message.

notes.Note: sbeattie> install path location disclosure, already widely known for packaged versions

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
